line.text: Betwixt mine eye and heart a league is took
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And each doth good turns now unto the other
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When that mine eye is famished for a look
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Or heart in love with sighs himself doth smother
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: With my love picture then my eye doth feast
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And to the painted banquet bids my heart
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Another time mine eye is my heart guest
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And in his thoughts of love doth share a part
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So either by thy picture or my love
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thy self away art present still with me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For thou not farther than my thoughts canst move
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And I am still with them and they with thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Or if they sleep thy picture in my sight
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Awakes my heart to heart and eye delight
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
